dict.string: Toggle tethering with your iPhone on / off
Turn iPhone USB Tethering On / Off

DEVICENAME=$(networksetup -listallhardwareports | grep -Eo "iPhone.*$");
if [[ "{query}" == "off" ]] then sudo networksetup -setnetworkserviceenabled "$DEVICENAME" off elif [[ "{query}" == "on" ]] then sudo networksetup -setnetworkserviceenabled "$DEVICENAME" on else echo "{query}" | pbcopy fi
Based on wifi toggle by Jonas Eriksen
